title: Startups, tech firms fuel demand for coworking spaces - Economic Times
content: Startups, tech firms fuel demand for coworking spaces  Economic Times
description: Different companies have different approaches. Some want to open multiple offices (intra-city centres) within large metros to reduce commute time for employees; there is also a big jump in interest for opening smaller spoke offices in small cities, owing to increased availability of employable talent due to pandemic-led migration.
